title: East-West Fusion
description: A dialogue between Eastern philosophy and Western design. This collection pairs classical Chinese proportions and natural materials with contemporary Western furniture forms — creating spaces that feel both deeply rooted and thoroughly modern.
descriptionCn: 东方哲学与西方设计的对话。该系列将中国古典比例和天然材料与当代西方家具形式相结合——创造出既根植于传统又彻底现代的空间。
